traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The chosen has {@quickref Advantage and Disadvantage|PHB|2|0|advantage} on {@quickref saving throws|PHB|2|1} against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Withering Spells
entries: When the chosen casts a spell of 1st level or higher, the next Withered Hand attack it makes before the end of its next turn deals extra damage equal to {@dice 1d6} per level of the spell cast.

actions.name: Withering Touch
entries: {@atk ms} +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 17 (5d6 damage) force damage plus extra damage from the Withering Touch trait. If this damage reduces a creature to 0 hit points, the creature and everything it is wearing and carrying, except magic items, are reduced to a pile of fine gray dust. The creature can be restored to life only by means of a {@spell true resurrection} or a {@spell wish} spell.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
